App_name: What does 2018 have in store for you?
Result:
2018 will be a year
                    of second chances!
                    If there’s a time for
                    you to get your life
                    back, it will be
                    this year.

2018 is preparing you to
                  find a better job with a
                  bigger pay! You will find
                  yourself having more
                  money than before, buf
                  don't spend it all!

2018 wants you to trust
                  the person you’re going
                  to be with. You need
                  to be ready to commit
                  the rest of your life with
                  this one!

2018 will be a year of
                    growth and accomplish-
                    ments! You will ﬁnd doors
                    opening for you that will
                    bring you closer to your
                    dreams.

2018 is preparing you to
                  have your own family!
                  Soon enough, you'll be
                  running around the house
                  with tiny versions of you.
                  Congratulations!
